location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bowyear, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, James Morley, to Thomas Hodges, President and Governor at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the conclusion of talks with Karim Khan and whether the order to withdraw from Bushire will be given or not. Also mentions reports of an attack on Bareen [Bahrain] by the Hoolaw Arabs [Hula].
